CHAT.comment: INV hands child the meerkat.
child throws meerkat in the air and mom laughs.
child walks over to the aquarium.
child walks back to the couch.
child points to the covered computer box.
child and mom hit the meerkat back and forth and laugh.
child bounces meerkat on lab and makes noises.
child points to the aquarium.
child flips meerkat by the tail and mom and child laugh.
child and mom laugh as child throws meerkat around and hits himself in the face with it.
child throws meerkat in the air and continues laughing.
child continues to throw meerkat around the room and laughs.
child looks into the air conditioner.
child makes noises.
child continues to throw the meerkat into the air.
mom throws meerkat into the air.
child throws meerkat up and the ceiling tiles bang.
child stands the meerkat up on the floor and mom nods her head.
meerkat hits the ceiling again.
mom picks up the meerkat and pats its head then moves its head back and forth and makes a noise.
child refers to the computer box.
mom tosses meerkat into the air and makes flying noises and child imitates.
mom examines child's neck.
mom and child laugh.
mom and child laugh.
child bounces meerkat on his lap and makes noises.
mom uses the meerkat to poke and tickle child.
child touches INV's bracelets.
INV and mom laugh.
INV takes the meerkat and leaves the room.
INV brings the robodog into the room.
child goes to robodog and pushes the button on its back and robodog sits.
child laughs.
child claps his hands and laughs when robodog begins to walk.
mom barks like a dog and then moves her hand in front of the robodog's face, trying to see if it senses it, then she pushes the button on his head.
child claps his hands.
mom talks to robodog.
mom places her hand over the back of the robodog.
mom talks to robodog and turns it around.
child spreads his legs and waits for the robodog to come to him.
mom laughs.
child presses the button on robodog's back and it sits, mom laughs.
child laughs.
mom points to the button on the robodog's head.
child laughs.
child pushes button on the head, and mom claps in front of robodog's face.
child claps.
child talks to robodog and claps hands.
mom sits on floor and turns robodog to face her and claps at it.
mom turns dog to face child.
mom talks to robodog.
child pushes button on back and dog sits, mom and child laugh, and he repeats this a couple of times.
mom covers robodog's eyes and then claps at it.
mom barks at the robodog.
mom talks to the robodog.
child continues to press button on robodog's back and it sits and stands repeatedly, mom and child laugh.
mom moves robodog more towards the center of the room.
mom barks at and claps at the robodog.
mom claps at the robodog.
INV turns the air on.
INV takes robodog out of the room.
INV brings degu into the room
INV fixes the air conditioner and leaves the room.
mom sits at the table with child.
mom talks to the degu.
child puts his fingers in between the metal grates of the top of the cage.
child moves hand across the top of the cage making noises at the degu.
mom talks to and points at the degu.
child shows mom with his hand how the degu's paws and fingers look.
mom makes clucking noises with her mouth, like she's trying to call the degu.
mom plays with the top of the cage and child becomes interested.
child sticks fingers in the top of the cage and draws them back quickly. Mom and child laugh.
child continues to stick his fingers in the cage.
child makes noises at the degu while he sticks his fingers in the cage.
mom makes clucking noises at the degu.
child makes noises.
mom nods, and mom and child laugh.
INV takes degu out of the room.
child and mom each gasp.
child gets up to help INV.
INV and child uncover the tank.
INV reaches into the tank to move the rock and make the starfish visible
mom pulls a chair over to the aquarium and sits down.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
mom and child are speaking softly and it's difficult to understand.
child sneezes.
child and mom move to the far side of the aquarium, and child sneezes again.
child wiggles and mom scratches his back.
mom points to the thermometer on the outside of the aquarium.
child is playing with the cords.
INV enters the room and hits mom's chair with the door.
INV covers the starfish tank.
INV nods towards the computer box.
INV uncovers the computer box.
mom gets on floor to play with computer box and child.
mom and child push the lights and wave hand over top of computer box and it lights up and makes noises.
mom puts fingers over the middle sensor, child does the same.
mom pushes on the lights.
mom pushes center sensor.
child touches center sensor.
mom touches top sensor and computer box makes noises.
child puts hands over both sensors.
child motions circles with his hands as he explains how he thinks the lights work.
mom and child comment on who wins based on what direction the lights spiral.
mom points at lights on the side and mumbles a long statement.
child holds hand on the top sensor.
mom motions in a circle with her hand.
mom makes noises and motions her hand back and forth.
mom and child continue to wave hands over the top of computer box.
mom waves both hands over the sensors.
INV covers the computer box.
INV brings car into the room.
mom laughs and moves to the ground.
mom and child move chairs to middle of the room to make a tunnel.
child rolls car through the tunnel and it hits one of the sides.
mom rolls car through the tunnel straight.
mom and child continue to roll the car back and forth through the tunnel.
mom rolled car around the outside of the tunnel.
child throws car off the couch.
mom examines the car.
INV enters the room.
mom and child leave the room to use the bathroom and return.
mom lays two chairs down on their sides.
mom and child laugh as the car hits the chairs.
child rearranges the chairs on the ground.
mom rolls car on the top part of the chairs.
child starts to pull up the sheet on the aquarium.
child makes sighing noises as he sits on the couch.
mom and child begin rolling the car back and forth again.
INV takes the car from the child.
